text:
Patch to fix the ToolTip text for the forward and back buttons, also to add a
space in the title window between the "Squiggle" application name and the SVG
file  currently open.  (The missing include also added here, needed for Batik to
compile.)
creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
glenmazza@yahoo.com

updated to remove polygon import (disregard previous patch)
